description: Daytime closures of the western section of Parliament Street in Ramsey is closed for repair works.
title: Section of Ramsey high street closed for footpath repairs
title_page: Section of Ramsey high street closed for footpath repairs - BBC News
maintext:
Motorists have been warned of daytime closures to a section of a high street in the north of the Isle of Man while footpath repairs are carried out.
Parliament Street in Ramsey is set to shut daily between its junctions with West Street and Christian Street until Friday.
The restrictions will be in place each day from 09:30 to 15:30 GMT each day.
Roadside parking in the area has been suspended throughout, with the exception of the disabled space outside the Co-Op, which be be accessible outside the closure times.
